description: Hey there, I'm David Gonzalez. I'm 25 years old; I'm a software engineer, a passionate geek, and gamer. I'm curious and introverted, and I like to help with anything. Also, if I don't know something, I consider it an opportunity to learn something new. I love to drink coffee even on hot days, and I love animals.

Hi all, my name is Alonso Zuñiga, and I’m 25 years old. I’m a father, researcher, hacker, optimizer, and questioner. I’m a software developer based in Saltillo with eight years of experience in the software industry. My focus area has been front-end development with Angular and back-end development with Laravel or Django, but I’m also skilled in app development for Android and iOS.
